ygData.subject: ANNOUNCE: Heritrix 3.0.0 is now available

Subject: ANNOUNCE: Heritrix 3.0.0 is now available
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=137285340; y=xKnCRw7VkF2BSf-a2Q7nB2vDYpOIUWEsvjKsP2iccmgd
X-Yahoo-Profile: gojomo

The first official release of Heritrix3 is now available, version 
3.0.0. For full information, please see the project wiki release 
notes:

https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Release+Notes+-+3.0.0

Binary (-dist) and source (-src) distributions are available at:

https://sourceforge.net/projects/archive-crawler/files/heritrix3/3.0.0/

Heritrix3 documentation now includes a User Guide and API Guide:

https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Heritrix+3.0+User+Guide
https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Heritrix+3.0+API+Guide

As always, problem reports, ideas, fix/feature contributions, and 
other kinds of feedback are all welcome here on the list and on 
the project wiki and JIRA issue tracker:

Heritrix Wiki: http://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix
Heritrix JIRA: http://webarchive.jira.com/browse/HER

Thanks!

- Gordon @ IA
